TopicTitle: Mk3 Internals gone? mk3 cockpit IVA view is just black? [.90]

Articles.Content:
Hi,

So currently i'm trying to build a spaceplane in 0.90...

I'm not sure if everyone's experiencing this, but when viewing IVA from the mk3 cockpit i just get 'black' and so i went to try and download the mk3 internals because i remembered it not only worked with rasterpropmonitor but it looked awesome...

...Cant find it anywhere?

Whats up with that?
Its not done yet. Note the description: "The IVA Is still in shipping and customs"

thanks for that i hadn't actually studied the patch notes...

...Still, shame i cant find the old internals in the meantime

You can use the MK2 just edit the cfg

INTERNAL

{

name = mk2CockpitStandardInternals

}

thanks for that i hadn't actually studied the patch notes...

...Still, shame i cant find the old internals in the meantime

The old internals? Why would you want to use that? if I remember correctly, the old IVA was just a grey wall, like the Mk. 1 Inline Cockpit.
There used to be a mod that added internals to the mk3, so that is likely what OP is looking for.

There used to be a mod that added internals to the mk3, so that is likely what OP is looking for.

exactly right I thought more people were aware of the old 'Mk3 Internals' mod that added an appropriate looking IVA view to the mk3 spaceplane cockpit...

@ MeCripp: I do have the mk2-internals for the mk1-inline cockpit... But it wouldn't look/ 'feel' right on the 3-seater mk3 cockpit.

Yeah, TT's Mk3 internals were good but not entirely compatible with the last working version of RPM.

Incidentally, I used to put the Mk3 Internals into SP+ before they had their own IVA. Turned out pretty nice. Here's an old video of me taking a spaceplane to orbit with TTs Mk3 IVA on SP+ (don't worry, I've gotten a lot better at building and flying spaceplanes since this..).

Edited December 23, 2014 by ObsessedWithKSP
I wonder if B9's S2 internals would work.
